content: This is your blog and you can say what you want but I don´t agree. What if I want to make a UI redesign of a product because I want clics or I need to compensate for a flimsy portfolio or just for fun? I understand your point but, please, let people do what they want. If a prefer to do an exercise of only my visual skills what the problem about that? So, maybe you hate our redesigns but I hate your post :)
